titles.enter-director-room-with-previous-settin: Enter director room with previous settings
titles.change-the-capture-resolution-this-defin: Change the capture resolution. This defines what the maximum resolution the video can be encoded at. A lower resolution will be smoother.
titles.attempts-to-capture-the-same-resolution-: Attempts to capture the same resolution that the window/display is displayed at
titles.this-will-capture-at-up-to-1920x1080-res: This will capture at up to 1920x1080 resolution, but it will use up more CPU and may reduce frame rate.
titles.this-will-capture-at-a-medium-resolution: This will capture at a medium resolution; suitable for gaming where frame rates matter more than resolution
titles.this-will-capture-at-a-low-resolution-su: This will capture at a low resolution, suitable for low powered computers or computers on poor networks
titles.enable-8-channel-audio-output-into-obs-s: Enable 8-channel audio output into OBS Studio, if 7.1-channel audio support is also enabled in OBS
titles.the-remote-guest-will-record-their-local: The Remote Guest will record their local stream and upload it to your Google Drive. *experimental*
titles.rotate-the-video-of-this-guest-globally: Rotate the video of this guest globally
titles.listen-to-this-guest-via-your-left-audio: Listen to this guest via your left audio speaker (Audio Channel 1)
titles.listen-to-this-guest-via-your-right-audi: Listen to this guest via your right audio speaker (Audio Channel 2)
titles.this-guest-will-only-hear-audio-from-you: This guest will only hear audio from your left or right mic channel. Make everyone has &stereo=1 added to their URL to enable two-channel audio.
titles.this-guest-will-only-hear-audio-your-cha: This guest will only hear audio your channel 1 mic source. Make everyone has &stereo=1 added to their URL to enable two-channel audio.
This guest will only hear audio your channel 2 mic source. Make everyone has &stereo=1 added to their URL to enable two-channel audio.
titles.-increase-this-at-your-peril-this-change: âš ï¸ Increase this at your peril. This changes the incoming video quailty that guests in the room sees; mobile devices excluded. Set too high and the room may become unstable, leading to lost audio and disconnected guests.
